domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

text:
@WHO @pahowho @WHO_Europe @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO @WHOSEARO @WHOWPRO Overexpression of ACE in myeloid (immune and epithelial) cells results in Ca++ recruitment.  Could ACE also result in calcium chloride-associated fluid retention (relevant to Covid19 lung filling)?

If so, could potassium supplementation (along with zinc) help balance that?
